it.polimi.se2019.view.client.cli

Class CLIView

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.view.client.RemoteView
      • it.polimi.se2019.view.client.cli.CLIView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MessageReceiverInterface, ViewInterface

    public class CLIView
extends RemoteView
    Implements the Remote view for the Cli.
    Author:
    MarcerAndrea, Desno365, Marchingegno
